actions.name: local-install
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); pipx install dist/atils-$VERSION.tar.gz --force

actions.name: docker-build-arm64
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-arm64

actions.name: docker-build-amd64
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-amd64

actions.name: docker-push-arm64
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); docker push aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-arm64

actions.name: docker-push-amd64
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); docker push aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-amd64

actions.name: create-manifest-versioned
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); docker manifest create aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION -a aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-arm64 -a aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-amd64
actions.description: Create the manifest for the multi-arch tagged release

actions.name: create-manifest-latest
actions.command: VERSION=$(grep -E '^version = "' pyproject.toml | cut -d'"' -f2); docker manifest create aidanhilt/atils:latest -a aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-arm64 -a aidanhilt/atils:$VERSION-amd64
actions.description: Create the manifest for the multi-arch tagged release

actions.name: push-manifest-versioned
actions.description: Push the manifest for the multi-arch tagged release

actions.name: push-manifest-latest
actions.description: Push the manifest for the multi-arch tagged release

action_sets.name: validate
action_sets.description: Runs code quality checks and tests

action_sets.name: local-install
action_sets.description: Builds and installs atils locally, for testing purposes

action_sets.name: ci-build-publish
action_sets.description: Builds and publishes atils to Docker Hub, as well as PyPI
